title: [Large-Scale] Fostering Global Citizenship through Conversational Skills: Human Education Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic communication skills and multicultural awareness
context.additional_context: A mobile-based course enhancing workplace global citizenship and respect for individuality through conversational skill training using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply active listening skills and empathetic response methods with at least 80% accuracy in conversations with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners successfully execute dialogue strategies to transform conflict into collaboration in real-case-based simulations at least twice out of three attempts.
Learners construct self-expression messages based on their unique experiences and achieve an effectiveness score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
